author: chaserxy
content: yes, this. Muir Glacier was really ugly in the sense that it was a hard fork solely for the purpose of pushing off the difficulty bomb. (and, even more inelegantly, it was done because everyone except Eric forgot about the bomb.) bad baggage. let's not do this again, please.

author: chaserxy
content: also, it shouldnt be hard to add to Berlin. Muir Glacier was specced in like under a week.
